panels.description: Total number of partitions for timetable.
panels.title: Partitions

panels.description: Total number of scheduler workers.

panels.title: Dispatchers

panels.description: Total number of janitors.
panels.title: Janitors

panels.description: Total number of keys contained in Timetable. (Note: this does not represent the actual number of scheduled messages.)
panels.title: Timetable Size

panels.description: Total number of deliveries since start.
panels.title: Scheduled Last Hr

panels.description: Total number of deliveries since start.
panels.title: Deliveried Last Hr

panels.description: Total number of messages removed from Timetable since start.
panels.title: Deleted Last Hr

panels.description: Worker information. All scheduling activities are distributed across one or more workers. Each worker is assigned timetable partitions to operate on.
panels.title: Worker Status

panels.description: Total application CPU utilization.
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: Worker memory usage.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Disk space utilization.

targets.expr: sum(kaspr_disk_space_used{namespace="$kubernetes_namespace",app_name="$app_name"}) by (namespace, app_name, worker_name) / sum(kaspr_disk_space_total{namespace="$kubernetes_namespace",app_name="$app_name"}) by (namespace, app_name, worker_name)

panels.title: Disk Space Utilization

panels.description: Dispatcher information. Dispatchers are responsible for delivering messages on time.
panels.title: Dispatchers

panels.description: Janitor  information. Janitors are responsible for removing delivered messages from the timetable.
panels.title: Janitors

panels.title: Schedule Rate

panels.description: Rate of messages delivered
panels.title: Delivery Rate

panels.description: Rate of messages delivered instantly (without delay).
panels.title: Instant Delivery Rate

panels.description: Rate of messages deleted from Timetable.
panels.title: Deletion Rate

panels.description: Rate of operations on Scheduler's Timetable.
panels.title: Table Operations Rate

panels.description: Rate of events received per stream
panels.title: Consumer Rate

panels.description: Rate of messages sent per topic
panels.title: Producer Rate

panels.title: Producer Send Duration
